articles.title: Real Madrid remain confident in their bid to sign Kylian Mbappe after missing out on Erling Haaland - Daily Mail
articles.description: PETE JENSON: Their interest in Haaland was never all-in, as it has been for Mbappe. In part that was down to the form of Karim Benzema. The 34-year-old is very much Madrid's number nine.

articles.description: Lawlor has been chief scout for 16 years after he was brought in under Sir Alex Ferguson in 2005 while Bout joined United as part of Louis van Gaal's backroom team in 2014.
